text: Nia daane Judah guu hula dalia nia daane Simeon, gei digaula gu haga magedaa digau Canaan ala nogo noho i lodo di waahale Zephath. Digaula gu haga halauwa di waahale deelaa, gu oho di maa, gu haga ingoo di maa bolo Hormah.1.17 Hormah: di ingoo deenei dono hadinga i nnelekai Hebrew boloo, “Gu oho”
